Html:
Hi!
When setting Is Enabled property on DatePicker to false, I'm getting Exception:
"'PART_DisabledVisual' name cannot be found in the name scope of 'System.Windows.Controls.Grid'."
Does anyone know how to fix this issue?
                                                          Thank you. Lena

Hi This is a known issue, .... Refer http://www.codeplex.com/wpf/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=7904
